txt.en: This elegantly written scroll directs you to take it to an Outfitter, who will exchange it for a package left behind for you by the Fashion Maven. It goes on to say that Outfitters can be found in Celondim, Stock, Trestlebridge, Othrikar, Rivendell, Thorin's Hall, Michel Delving and Bree-town.

'My goodness, you are dressed well! I can see why the Fashion Maven judged you so well! There is little I can offer you to improve your appearance, other than the notice you so richly deserve for your wonderful taste!\n\n'Thank you, [placeholder] for gracing my presence. You have shown me all that is possible with a well appointed appearance.'
At some point you gained the attention of the Fashion Maven, who judged your appearance and found you stunning, a paragon of fashion!
Bring the Fashion Maven's scroll to an Outfitter

Bring the Fashion Maven's scroll to an Outfitter to exchange it for the package left for you by the Maven. Outfitters can be found in Celondim, Stock, Trestlebridge, Othrikar, Rivendell, Thorin's Hall, Michel Delving and Bree-town.
